(TK, does "reappeared from hiding" mean TK came out of his cloak?)

Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:



Double Punch saw Injector fall, tripping over KitKat and Terrorsaur.  "A 
cloaking system, eh?  How nice." he said, knowing how to find it, having seen 
where the shots had come from and having a cloaking system himself, he acted 
in almost the blink of an eye.

Raising a pincher he fired a missile six inches to the left of where the 
shots had hit, hopefully hitting the middle of the cloaked assailant.

---

Manterror looked over, hearing gunfire, seeing Injector down.  "OH!  So 
they're picking on us now, after we just defend ourselves!  You'll pay for 
that!" he yelled, raising both of his arms, firing one ion disk at KitKat, 
one at Terrorsaur.
"That'll teach you, ya misfits!"
